name: @beabee/beabee-common
description: Shared code between Beabee projects for Node.js, Deno and the browser

tasks.check: deno task check:format && deno task check:types
tasks.test: deno task test:deno:types && deno task test:deno && deno task test:node
tasks.test:types: deno task test:deno:types && deno task test:node:types
tasks.test:node: deno task test:node:esm && deno task test:node:cjs
tasks.build: deno task clear && deno task generate:index && deno task sync && deno task format && deno task build:types && deno task build:node && deno task build:browser
tasks.build:node: deno task build:node:esm && deno task build:node:cjs
tasks.cache: deno task cache:deno && deno task cache:node
tasks.generate:index: deno run --allow-read --allow-write scripts/generate-index.ts && deno task format
